summary:
This is the exact same model and texture as the original Stalhrim Shield.
Except this one is heavy, weighs 13 pounds, and has the same armor rating as a Dragonplate Shield.
Version: 1.10
descriptionHtml:
Introducing the Thick Stalhrim Shield which is the exact same model and texture as the original Stalhrim Shield.
However, this one is heavy, weighs 13 pounds, and has the same armor rating as a Dragonplate Shield.

I just threw this together because I was upset there was no heavy Stalhrim shield.

Yes, it works with the Stalhrim enchanting bonus.

This item is only available through crafting.

v1.10
Now compatible with Stalhrim Enchanted.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31805/

Permissions:
Go crazy.
I do not think permission for this mod, Thick Stalhrim Shield, is necessary and I insist you do not give me credit.
Why? Took me about 5 minutes to throw this together.
I\'d feel ashamed as a modder to accept credit for this mod.
author: UltimatePowa
